functionDecorators.name: contractType
functionDecorators.description: Returns the module type of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: contractVersion
functionDecorators.description: Returns the version of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: distribute
functionDecorators.description: Release owed amount of the `token` to all of the payees.

functionDecorators.name: distribute
functionDecorators.description: Release the owed amount of token to all of the payees.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleMember
functionDecorators.description: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleMemberCount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

functionDecorators.name: grantRole
functionDecorators.description: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: hasRole
functionDecorators.description: Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Performs the job of the constructor.shares_ are scaled by 10,000 to prevent precision loss when including fees.

functionDecorators.name: multicall
functionDecorators.description: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

functionDecorators.name: payee
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the address of the payee number `index`.

functionDecorators.name: payeeCount
functionDecorators.description: Get the number of payees.

functionDecorators.name: release
functionDecorators.description: Triggers a transfer to `account` of the amount of Ether they are owed, according to their percentage of the total shares and their previous withdrawals.

functionDecorators.name: release
functionDecorators.description: Triggers a transfer to `account` of the amount of `token` tokens they are owed, according to their percentage of the total shares and their previous withdrawals. `token` must be the address of an IERC20 contract.

functionDecorators.name: released
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the amount of `token` tokens already released to a payee. `token` should be the address of an IERC20 contract.

functionDecorators.name: released
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the amount of Ether already released to a payee.

functionDecorators.name: renounceRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

functionDecorators.name: revokeRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: setContractURI
functionDecorators.description: Sets contract URI for the contract-level metadata of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: shares
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the amount of shares held by an account.

functionDecorators.name: supportsInterface
functionDecorators.description: See {IERC165-supportsInterface}.

functionDecorators.name: totalReleased
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the total amount of `token` already released. `token` should be the address of an IERC20 contract.

functionDecorators.name: totalReleased
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the total amount of Ether already released.

functionDecorators.name: totalShares
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the total shares held by payees.
